amendment.description: To impose criminal penalties for the unsafe operation of unmanned aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3623 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3623 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 3464.
